thread.title: Axel Springer says will not buy Financial Times Group

title: Axel Springer says will not buy Financial Times Group
text:
Tip : Use comma (,) to separate multiple quotes. Learn more... 
Thu, Jul 23, 2015, 15:21 BST - UK Markets close in 1 hr 9 mins Axel Springer says will not buy Financial Times Group Reuters - UK Focus – 9 minutes ago 18.21 -0.59 
FRANKFURT, July 23 (Reuters) - German publisher Axel Springer said on Thursday that it will not buy the Financial Times Group from Pearson (Xetra: 858266 - news ) , following media speculation about such a deal. (Reporting by Arno Schuetze; Editing by Christoph Steitz) Tax cuts, pensions, childcare, online accounts and beer duty, here's … Related Stock Articles Follow the quotes you care about most.
